title: Himi 160
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
’Eiki tuku kiate au
‘A e fua lelei,
Ko e loto manavahē
‘O taau mo e muli.
2.
Pea u tauhi hoku ngaahi
‘Aho, ‘i lalo ni,
‘I he loto angavaivai,
Mo e manavahē.
3.
’Oku lelei kiate au,
Ke u ‘i he po’uli,
Pea mole ‘iate au
‘A ho’o melino.
4.
’I he’eku liaki’i
‘A ho’o anga’ofa
‘I he’eku ta’e vakai
Mo e angahala.
5.
’E lelei ‘eku mamahi
Pea u houhau’ia
‘I he’eku anga kovi,
‘Eiki ki ho’o ‘ofa. *
